get.description: Returns the risk score associated with the specified transaction.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Network ID of the transaction. Supports multiple networks including solana, osmosis-1, dydx-mainnet-1, cosmoshub-4, neutron-1, stellar, and others.

get.description: Returns risk assessment history (newest first).
Returns comprehensive risk assessment for a Solana token using ML analysis.

parameters.name: asset_address
parameters.description: Asset identifier (chain-agnostic). Currently only Solana token mint (base58, 3244 chars) is supported.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network for token risk (only solana supported)

200.description: Token risk assessment with detailed factors and scoring

get.description: Analyzes cross-chain payments to assess risk using advanced heuristic rules and ML-powered analysis. Evaluates sender and recipient addresses based on transaction history, behavioral patterns, interaction history, address poisoning detection, malicious connections, and security indicators.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Payment amount in USD equivalent (must be positive)

parameters.name: sender_network
parameters.description: Sender blockchain network (e.g., solana, osmosis, ethereum)

parameters.name: sender_token
parameters.description: Token/denom being sent (optional, enables token risk assessment)

200.description: Payment risk assessment with individual risk factors and overall risk level

post.description: Forwards the body to the simulator and returns its response.
post.summary: Simulate Solana transactions (GET with JSON body)

post.description: Simulate a Solana transaction to get the address balance changes after the transaction is executed.
Simulate a Cosmos transaction on the specified network to get the address balance changes after the transaction is executed.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network to simulate the transaction on

200.description: Simulated transaction result

get.description: Returns current webhook settings.
Returns a list of token transfers that match the specified search term.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Current status(es) of the transfer, comma-separated (e.g. 'SUCCEEDED,FAILED')

parameters.name: bridges
parameters.description: Bridges or networks used for the transfer

parameters.name: token_symbols
parameters.description: Token symbols involved in the transfer

parameters.name: min_usd
parameters.description: Minimum USD amount (decimal). Converted to number.

parameters.name: max_usd
parameters.description: Maximum USD amount (decimal). Converted to number.

200.description: List of token transfers that match the specified search term.

get.description: Returns a token transfer that matches the specified ID.

200.description: Token transfer that matches the specified ID.

info.title: Range API
info.description: The Range API for crypto addresses.

tags.name: Address Information
tags.description: Get information about a crypto address.

tags.name: Riskyier
tags.description: Get risk information about a crypto address.

tags.name: Simulator
tags.description: Simulate a transaction on a network.

Authorization.name: X-API-KEY
Authorization.description: Authorization method required to allow user to access the api endpoints.

next_cursor.description: Opaque string cursor pointing to the next page of results. null if there is no next page.

previous_cursor.description: Opaque string cursor pointing to the previous page of results. null if there is no previous page.

first_page_cursor.description: Opaque string cursor pointing to the very first page in the entire dataset with respect to the current filter.

last_page_cursor.description: Opaque string cursor pointing to the very last page in the entire dataset with respect to the current filter.

scrollId.description: Scroll ID for pagination (only when useScroll=true)
Scroll ID for pagination (only when useScroll=true)

hasMore.description: Whether there are more results available (only when useScroll=true)

count.description: Total count of payments (only in initial request or traditional pagination)

scrollId.description: Scroll ID for pagination (only when useScroll=true)

hasMore.description: Whether there are more results available (only when useScroll=true)

address.description: On-chain address flagged as malicious or related

distance.description: Distance in hops from the queried address (0 = directly malicious)

name_tag.description: Known name tag or label for the address

entity.description: Entity or organization associated with the address

category.description: Category of malicious behavior (e.g. scam, exploit, mixer)

name_tag.description: Name or label for the attributed address

entity.description: Entity or organization associated with the address

address_role.description: Role or function of the address

numHops.description: Minimum number of hops to the closest malicious address

maliciousAddressesFound.description: List of malicious or related addresses discovered in the path

reasoning.description: Explanation of why the risk level/score was assigned

attribution.description: Attribution information for known non-malicious addresses

level.description: Risk level classification of this factor

explanation.description: Explanation detailing why this factor has its assigned level

asset_address.description: Asset identifier (Solana mint / EVM contract / Cosmos denom). Currently Solana mint.

risk_level.description: Overall risk level derived from weighted factors

risk_score.description: Aggregate risk score for the token

max_score.description: Maximum theoretical score used for normalization

risk_percentage.description: Percentage representation of the risk score (0-100)

total_factors.description: Total number of evaluated risk factors

summary.description: Summary counts of risk factor severity levels

risk_factors.description: Map of risk factor key to its detailed assessment

processing_time_ms.description: Processing time in milliseconds for the assessment

errors.description: List of non-fatal errors encountered while computing the assessment

factor.description: Unique identifier for the risk factor

risk_level.description: Risk level classification of this factor

description.description: Human-readable explanation of the risk factor
description.example: Recipient is a new wallet with minimal transaction history

overall_risk_level.description: Overall risk level determined by maximum risk approach. Possible values: low, medium, high, unknown

risk_factors.description: List of individual risk assessments performed

errors.description: List of errors encountered during analysis (empty if no errors)

request_summary.description: Echo of the original request parameters for verification

tx.description: Keplr transaction or Base64 encoded raw transaction

usd.description: USD equivalent of the amount transferred

icon_urls.description: List of icon URLs associated with this network or participant

type.description: Type of transfer (e.g., ibc, cctp, etc.)

sender.description: Information about the sender of the transfer

receiver.description: Information about the receiver of the transfer

beginTimestamp.description: Start timestamp for the query range

endTimestamp.description: End timestamp for the query range

totalUsd.description: Total amount for this denomination in USD
Total amount for all denominations in USD

denomSums.description: Sum of amounts for each denomination

scrollId.description: Scroll ID for pagination (only when useScroll=true)

hasMore.description: Whether there are more results available (only when useScroll=true)
